title: Low Priority Queue
body: Is it possible to get low priority queue removed? i haven't played in like over 6 months and just started again last night, this morning I had to afk to drive my GF to the hospital.. Now I'm stuck with 5 games @ a 20 minute wait before each...

replies.body: Sorry to hear about that, hoping everything is okay!  The only way to remove a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) would be to play through the required games.  Even though some time has past and the leave wasn't intentional, leaverbuster will take previous history or standing into account.  Hope that helps clears things up!
